title: Calories in a Cheerio
meta_description: Discover calories in a cheerio – about 1 kcal per piece – plus full nutrition facts, macros, tweaks, and FAQs for original Cheerios cereal.
assumptions: Original plain Cheerios cereal; one piece weighs ~0.28 g; based on USDA data scaled from 28 g serving (1 cup ≈100 pieces).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, batch, and exact size; values are approximate for dry cereal. Add milk or toppings to adjust.

quick_answer.text: A single Cheerio contains about 1 calorie and negligible macros.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cheerio?
faqs.a: Approximately 1 kcal per single piece of original Cheerios.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one cheerio?
faqs.a: About 0.2 g total carbs, including 0.03 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a cheerio have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligible: ~0.03 g protein and 0.02 g fat per piece.

faqs.q: How many cheerios in a standard serving?
faqs.a: Around 100 pieces per 1 cup (28 g) serving, totaling 100 kcal.
Yes, one cheerio has ~1.9 mg sodium; a full serving has 190 mg.
